section.title: Installing the Cloud Controller
section.para: Install the messaging queue server, RabbitMQ. You also have the option of installing Apache Qpid, refer to the Compute Administration Manual for instructions.
Install the required nova- packages, and dependencies are automatically installed.
section.literallayout: sudo apt-get install nova-compute nova-volume nova-vncproxy nova-api nova-ajax-console-proxy nova-cert nova-consoleauth nova-doc nova-scheduler nova-network
